content:
Given the paragraph and the given information, write down a summary of the entire paragraph.
The Amazons were a race of all-female warriors, based in Greek mythology, who were said to live on the island of Themyscira. They were trained in the art of combat and showed great skill with the bow.

Information: Themyscira was the home of the Amazons, the legendary all-female warrior race.
The Amazons, a legendary all-female warrior race from Greek mythology, resided on the island of Themyscira. Renowned for their combat skills, they were particularly adept with the bow.
